description.title: instructions
description.text:
The points on the map are the bus stops serviced by a certain bus number. Out of the options provided, choose the correct bus number. Correct answers are marked in green, and wrong answers are marked in red.
To make the quiz easier, there is a question bank of possible options; the quiz will only select services from this question bank. For every correct guess you make, a new service is added to this question bank. If you want a different set of options, you can just refresh the page.
Try to get as many correct in a row. For every 5 correct guesses in a row, the number of options increases by 1. If you guess wrongly, your streak ends, and everything is reset.
If you change difficulty, everything is also reset.

description.title: instructions
description.text: Here are some of the cities in the world. Answers are not case or space-sensitive. If you type a correct answer, a grey location marker will change color to a shade of green. Obtained from <<https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/juanmah/world-cities>>this dataset</>.

description.title: instructions
description.text: Here are most of the MRT stations in Singapore, including future ones up till the CR Phase 1. Answers are not case or space-sensitive. If you type a correct answer, a grey location marker will change color to the colour of the MRT line.

description.title: description
description.text: There are quizzes out there that test the Planning Areas of Singapore. However, subzones are an even smaller subdivision of Singapore. There are 322 of them, so I decided to go into quiz creation so that I can practice it for myself.

description.title: instructions
description.text: Here are some of the schools in Singapore. Answers are not case or space-sensitive. If you type a correct answer, a grey location marker will change color to a shade of green.
